title: Furloughed government workers may not be entitled to back pay, reports say, as Trump claims some jobs ‘will never come back’ – live
summary: A White House memo disclosed by various U.S. media outlets indicates that the government does not plan to guarantee back pay for federal workers who continue to work during the shutdown. This decision has raised concerns among affected employees about financial security. The memo highlights the challenges and uncertainty surrounding the ongoing government shutdown.

title: ‘Kardashian of Cheshire’ paedophile jailed for luxury handbag fraud
summary: Jack Watkin showcased a lavish lifestyle after defrauding victims, including his father and friends, out of nearly £200,000. His fraudulent activities involved deception to acquire funds from those close to him. Ultimately, his actions led to financial ruin for multiple individuals while he pretended to live a millionaire's life.
